summary: This document is an email chain between U.S. Attorney's Office personnel regarding a draft government response letter to be filed in court on April 19, 2021. It shows internal coordination on legal filings in the Epstein case.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email attaching a draft government response letter for filing.

events.title: Draft Government Response Prepared
events.description: A draft letter from the government in response to court orders was prepared for filing.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is an internal email regarding a legal filing in the Epstein case on April 19, 2021.
It shows coordination within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The subject matter is a government response to court orders, indicating ongoing legal proceedings.
